<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tactical Entry](/Feats.aspx?ID=4960) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 175 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Master in [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Requirements**
You rolled Stealth for initiative in this encounter, and neither you nor any enemies have acted yet

</column>

---

You [Stride](/Actions.aspx?ID=88). This movement doesn’t trigger any reactions.
name: Tactical Entry
requirement: You rolled Stealth for initiative in this encounter, and neither you nor any enemies have acted yet
